item.title: Commands to webpages!will Rep+!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Yeah,but i was going to have a ::forum command. Also,i put a picture from photobucket,onto my forum,and changed the html so when you click it it takes you to highscores.Problem is,for some strange reason,it makes the link my forums link AND the highscores link
E.G
www.forumslink.com/www.highscoreslink.com/highscores.php

Read full topic

@Xiionz wrote:

How About Just Add the highscores on the forum and leave out the command, in my perspective it’s pointless for a command when they can stop being lazy and go to the forum and look at it and it gives them a reason to register :]

item.title: Commands to webpages!will Rep+!
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey,i need a command that sends my player to a webpage.
i use this:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("voteforcash")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.pastascapewebclient.hostoi.com/vote.php", 12000); }

For my vote for cash,but when i try to copy it,and change the link/name ,E.G:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("highscores")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("http://pastascapewebclient.hostoi.com/highscores/highscores.php", 12000); }
it doesnt open for the players. So,voteforcash opens when you do ::voteforcash,but ::highscores does nothing.how do i fix?

Read full topic
